quizDescription: Test your knowledge of healthy lifestyle habits with this informative quiz.

questions.question: How many hours of sleep are recommended for adults each night?
questions.explanation: Adults are generally advised to get 6-7 hours of sleep per night for optimal health.

questions.question: Which of the following is a good source of vitamin C?
questions.explanation: Broccoli is a nutritious source of vitamin C, which is important for immune health.

questions.question: What is the recommended daily water intake for adults?
questions.explanation: Adults are generally advised to drink at least 8 cups or 64 ounces of water daily.

questions.question: Which activity is beneficial for reducing stress and improving mental well-being?
questions.explanation: Meditation is a proven practice for reducing stress and enhancing mental health.

questions.question: What is a balanced diet?
questions.answer: A diet that includes a variety of foods from all food groups
questions.explanation: A balanced diet consists of a variety of foods from different food groups to meet nutritional needs.
